response.overview: Tateishi Daichi, an employee at a book design company in Tokyo, has very little interest in real life romance and prefers romance found in books. That is until one day, he reunites with Ichikura Kousuke, someone he knew from his university days who is now working as an editor at a big publishing house. This stirs memories in Daichi as Kousuke was the one person in his life he wanted to forget. (Source: Sketchy BL Subbing Team)
response.title: SECOND BLUE
